Text: Bernice Pauahi Bishop (December 19, 1831 – October 16, 1884), born Bernice Pauahi Pākī, was an "aliʻ i" (noble) of the Royal Family of the Kingdom of Hawaii and a well known philanthropist.
Triplets:<Bernice Pauahi Bishop
1:
--------------------
Text: Bernice Pauahi Bishop:  At her death, her estate was the largest private landownership in the Hawaiian Islands, comprising approximately 9% of Hawaii's total area.
